resources.string: This can help you track your overall financial progress as well as your progress toward specific goals.
Note: You can fill up your Bill Information here to calculate it Daily, Weekly and Monthly
Note: Show the different kinds of graphs, including pie graph, bar graph and so on.
Note: Go back to Login page to protect your information and data.
Note: Show the bill name and bill price this month.
Note: Show the overall price monthly
Note: Show the highest price of your bills sort by top.
